poem:
Title: "A Year of Promise: 2024"

Much proclaimed, the hopes of twenty-four,
a sphere in blue bathing gold 'n more,
Economic seas bubbled, effervescent dreams,
Soft lands, high skies, unfolding scenes.
A splash of cash, a seizing roar,
tightened fists, open boutique's door,
Unfolding Europe, crowned by sun,
the tale of twenty-four, yet spun.
